entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 50
LOWS AROUND 30

MOSTLY SUNNY
